float x,y,side,theta,x0,y0
ellipseMode(CENTER);
 
0300, circle, ellipse(x,y,2*side,2*side);, ellipse(x,y - side,side,side);, circle
0301, line, strokeWeight(3);point(x + 0.5*side,y + 0.2*side);strokeWeight(1);line(x + 0.5*side,y + 0.2*side,x + 0.5*side,y + 0.8*side);,point(x + 0.5*side,y + 0.8*side),line(x,y,x+side,y);
0302, 180, line(x + 0.5*side,y,x + 0.5*side,y+side);ellipse(x+0.25*side,y + 0.5*side,0.2*side,0.2*side);ellipse(x+0.75*side,y + 0.5*side,0.2*side,0.2*side);,theta += PI;
0303, +120, {0300,0340,0300,0340,0300,0340,0300,0340,0300,0340,0300,0340,0300,0350,0350,0350,0350,0350,0350,0350,0300,0350,0300,0350,0300,0350,0300,0350,0300,0300,0350,0300,0350,0300,0350,0300,0350,0300,0321,0302,0310,0310,0310,0310,0310,0310,0310,0310,0310,0310,0310,0343,0343,0343,0301,0306,0301,0306,0301,0306,0301,0306,0301,0306,0301} , theta += 2*PI/3;
0304, +90,{0353,0310,0314,0310,0301,0304,0301,0304,0301,0304,0301,0324,0353,0353,0310,0310,0310,0300,0311,0311,0311,0304,0310,0310,0310,0300,0311,0311,0311,0304,0310,0310,0310,0300,0311,0311,0311,0304,0310,0310,0310,0300,0311,0311,0311,0324,0304,0343,0343,0311,0304,0311,0343},theta += 90;, rotate angle by +90 degrees
0305, +72,{0353,0310,0314,0310,0301,0305,0301,0305,0301,0305,0301,0305,0301,0305,0311,0314,0311,0302,0311,0311,0343}, theta += 2*PI/5;, rotate by 72 degrees
0306, +60,{0353,0310,0314,0310,0301,0306,0301,0306,0301,0306,0301,0306,0301,0306,0301,0306,0311,0314,0314,0314,0311,0343}, theta += PI/3, rotate by 60 degrees
0307, +2tm,{0301,0317,0301}, theta += 2*theta_m, rotate by twice the magic angle
